settings.Name: Elephantine
settings.Description: Forming the traditional frontier between ancient Kush and Egypt, the fortified Island of Elephantine was situated on the Nile River at the first cataract. As the border between Upper Egypt and Lower Nubia, Elephantine became an important way-station for the trade in ivory and other goods. It was considered to be the home of the god Khnum, guardian of the source of the Nile, and boasted an impressive temple complex.
